courseDescription:
Manufacturing Processes: Heat Treatment and Surface Properties is a free online course that will teach you about the fundamental aspects of the heat treatment process in the joining of metals as well as aspects of improving surface properties. You will learn about the types of tempering processes through heat treatment and the processes of coating to improve surface properties of a finished product.

This course begins by introducing you to the fundamentals of the heat treatment process, the basic principles used for the heat treatment of steel, and the annealing process. You will learn about the normalizing and hardening of materials, the stress-relieving process, and critical annealing processes. Furthermore, you will learn about types of tempering processes. You will also learn about the processes for changing the chemical composition and coating processes.

This free online course will increase your knowledge about the heat treatment process and surface properties. Lastly, you will learn about enhancing surface layers through mechanical properties for improved performance of a product. This course will be of great interest to engineering students, as well as manufacturers. Start this free course today and increase your knowledge of successful manufacturing processes through heat treatment and improving surface properties.
